text: Catharine Alice MacKinnon (born October 7, 1946) is an American radical feminist legal scholar and lawyer. She is Elizabeth A. Long Professor of Law at the University of Michigan Law School. MacKinnon has been called a "victim feminist" by Naomi Wolf.The Guardian MacKinnon graduated from Yale Law School in 1977. As a legal scholar she opposes sexual harassment and pornography. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Academics from Michigan Category:American activists Category:American feminist writers Category:Lawyers from Minneapolis Category:American radical feminists Category:Anti-pornography activists Category:Yale University alumni
title: Catharine A. MacKinnon
